name: The Magical Tower of Targh
description:
The kingdom of Targh fell to the monochrome horde, only a few survivors and the king manage to take shelter in a magical tower powered by paint.

Survive as long as you can.

[Instructions]

Use your mouse to pass through text dialogues, there is an in-game tutorial.

I got inspiration from The  Billy and Mandy  The Fright Before Christmas flash game and Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles: My Life as a Darklord (I know, weird combination).

This game was the most complex one I've ever made, hope you like it!
